event_title_eng: Pancake Breakfast with tiny lecture on icebreakers for team events
event_desc_eng: You will have the opportunity to come and meet our staff, get a feel for our space, enjoy some yummy pancakes in good company and get some valuable impulses in our mini speech on warm-up exercises for team events, Workshops, and lectures.
event_title_de: Pancake FrÃ¼hstÃ¼ck mit Impulsvortrag zu icebreaker-Ãœbungen bei Teamevents
event_desc_de: Wir laden euch ein unseren Space kennenzulernen, ein paar leckere pancakes in guter Gesellschaft zu genieÃŸen und wir geben euch ein paar wertvolle Informationen zu KennenlernÃ¼bungen in Workshopkontexten, Teamveranstaltungen usw in unserem Impulsvortrag mit.

event_title_eng: Betabreakfast with Metadesign & Digital Rheuma Lab
event_desc_eng:
Betabreakfast is our weekly breakfast tradition at Betahaus | Kreuzberg connecting entrepreneurs, startups, creatives, and anyone interested in the Berlin startup scene.

Metadesign & Digital Rheuma Lab will take over the stage and present their business ideas.

Afterwards there will be a Q&A round and networking round with breakfast.

The documentary is about a 9-year-old jungle child named Manop who dreams of becoming a star in Thailand's most popular folk opera LIKAY. Marco follows the Burmese refugee's journey from his school's chicken coop in the middle of the jungle to the stage to preform with his idol and Thailand's LIKAY superstar CHAIYA MITCHAI.
Host & moderator: Pisen Sou, Global Communication: Politics & Society (MA Student), University of Erfurt
Screening & talk with director Marco Wilms
The MONDAY MOVIE NIGHTS -ASIAN FILM SERIES are part of a C*SPACE special summer project called â€œPop-Up Teahouse Berlin" that intends to create a space for transcultural encounters. The film series is a community initiative by scholarship holders of Konrad-Adenauer-Stiftung (KAS). It is supported by the Asia-Pacific Department of KAS.

event_desc_eng: Part of the DNA of C*SPACE Berlin is definitely its love for tea culture, including the diversity of teas, but also the culture and "the way of teaâ€: Whether used as method of mindfulness and calming down during a busy working day, or as a place of discussion, the various Pop-Up Teahouse formats at C*SPACE range from JUST BEEING over some cups of tea to literature saloon evenings. This summer every Friday 4-7 pm there are TEA TIME Hang-Outs at C*SPACE, welcome by co-workers at the space as much as by tea lovers coming explicitly for TEA TIME. We look forward to welcome tea lovers and any curious minds participating the Co-Working Festival! No reservation needed. Pop-Ups welcome!

This summer every Friday 4-7 pm there are TEA TIME Hang-Outs at C*SPACE, welcome by co-workers at the space as much as by tea lovers coming explicitly for TEA TIME. We look forward to welcome tea lovers and any curious minds participating the Co-Working Festival! No reservation needed. Pop-Ups welcome!

event_title_eng: CHAI TALKS: UNFOLDING FREEDOM - A Facilitated Conversation at C*SPACEâ€™s Pop-Up Teahouse Berlin
event_desc_eng:
Our C*SPACE guests in residence that week, Sudebi Thakurata and Probal Banerjee, creatives, facilitators, entrepreneurs, teachers from Bangalore and Katelijn Verstraete, cultural consultant with long-time work experience between Asia and Europe (until recently in Singapore,  now between Brussels and Berlin), will be hosting a conversation under the title "Chai Talks: Unfolding Freedom" - More details soon. But expect something creative, deep, inspiring, global local!
Sudebi: Meta Facilitator, Narrative Designer, Learning Curator, Dialogue Weaver, Possibility Framer, Thinking Visualiser. |https://www.linkedin.com/in/sudebi/
Probal: Entrepreneur, Facilitator, Design-led Innovator, Regenerative Leader, Transformation Enabler
https://www.linkedin.com/in/probal/
Katelijn: â€œCultural boundary spanning is key to building trust between peopleâ€
https://www.linkedin.com/in/katelijn-verstraete

C*SPACE Co-host: Katja HellkÃ¶tter, https://www.linkedin.com/in/katja-hellkoetter-b5b10b3a/

Agenda:
6:30 pm: Doors open, welcome tea
7 - 9 pm: Facilitated Interaction (more info TBA soon)
till 10 pm: Open networking

Reservation preferred: pop-up-teahouse@c-space.berlin

event_desc_eng: Every Wednesday 12-1 pm it is COMMUNITY YOGA TIME at C*SPACE taught by our community member, yoga teacher and health coach Shawnee Russell (https://worldsbetween.org) (in English). On the occasion of the CO-WORKING Festival, on Wednesday 7th, the yoga session will be followed by a joined CO-WORK POTLUCK LUNCH (1-2:00 pm). We take the opportunity for exchange about ways of creating healthy (work) lives and sustainability at the work space, and a few of C*SPACE regular co-workers will present what they do, incl. the entrepreneurs duo Jan & Marek, founders of WINGQS sustainable sports wearâ€¦ This CO-WORK LUMNCH will be also open for all our visitors from the Co-working Festival! Please register here to have a better organisation: info@c-space.eu

event_title_eng: Get to know Coworking at Dock3 Lausitz
event_desc_eng:
On the occasion of the Berlin & Brandenburg Coworking Festival, we will open the doors of our coworking area to all interested parties on 08.09.2022. Get to know coworking at Dock3 Lausitz. Cool drinks and coffee are waiting for you.
From 6 pm we invite to the summer party for founders.
event_desc_de:
AnlÃ¤sslich des Berlin & Brandenburg Coworking Festivals Ã¶ffnen wir am 08.09.2022 die TÃ¼ren unseres Coworking-Bereichs fÃ¼r alle Interessenten. Lernt Coworking im Dock3 Lausitz kennen. Auf Euch warten kÃ¼hle GetrÃ¤nke und Kaffee.

event_title_eng: Digital Nomad Meetup: Taxes, Destinations, Career Advise and the future of Remote Work
event_desc_eng:
Let's enjoy a nomadic afternoon together to talk about favourite nomad topics.
- Taxation: Legal ways to optimize taxes
- Where to go next: Bansko, the nomad capital
- Career advise & how to land your dream remote job

This is an interactive event format where everyone can ask questions and share their own experiences. To kick off the event we have invited three speakers that will give a quick introduction into each topic.

XX, who will share their experiences with low tax jurisdictions and common strategies to keep the authorities happy

Matthias Zeitler, is an ecosystem developer in a rural mountain resort in Bulgaria that is growing into one of the most exciting nomad destinations in Europe.

Yana Maeva, Career Coach and People & Culture leader, will advise on how to envision and achieve a meaningful career goal, land your dream remote job and how to make a career transition.
event_title_de: Digitales Nomaden Meetup: Steuern, Traumziele, Karriere und die Zukunft des ortsunabhÃ¤ngigen Arbeitens
event_desc_de:
Lassen Sie uns gemeinsam einen nomadischen Nachmittag genieÃŸen, um Ã¼ber Lieblingsthemen der Nomaden zu sprechen.

- Besteuerung: Rechtliche Wege zur Steueroptimierung
- Wohin als nÃ¤chstes: Bansko, die Hauptstadt der Nomaden
- Karriereberatung und wie Sie Ihren Traumjob an Land ziehen

Dies ist ein interaktives Veranstaltungsformat, bei dem jeder Fragen stellen und seine eigenen Erfahrungen teilen kann. Zum Auftakt der Veranstaltung haben wir drei Referenten eingeladen, die eine kurze EinfÃ¼hrung in jedes Thema geben werden.

XX, die ihre Erfahrungen mit Niedrigsteuer-Jurisdiktionen und gemeinsame Strategien teilen werden, um die BehÃ¶rden bei Laune zu halten

Matthias Zeitler ist ein Ã–kosystementwickler in einem lÃ¤ndlichen Bergresort in Bulgarien, das sich zu einem der aufregendsten Nomadenziele in Europa entwickelt.

Yana Maeva, Career Coach und People & Culture Leader, berÃ¤t Sie, wie Sie sich ein sinnvolles Karriereziel vorstellen und erreichen, Ihren Traumjob an Land ziehen und wie Sie einen Karrierewechsel vollziehen kÃ¶nnen.

event_desc_eng: Please bring your own mat! Meeting point: The Garage @ HeartSpace - Urbanstrasse 70)
event_desc_de: Please bring your own mat! Meeting point: The Garage @ HeartSpace - Urbanstrasse 70)

event_desc_eng:
Start your day with a sugar kick provided by HeartSpace. Nearby we will have a group discussion focusing on the concept and benefits of "community" and how we interact in shared spaces, led by Michaella Benvenisti, Leadership Development and Life Coach based in Berlin.
Meeting Point: 4th Floor Reception at Urbanstrasse 71
event_desc_de:
Start your day with a sugar kick provided by HeartSpace. Nearby we will have a group discussion focusing on the concept and benefits of "community" and how we interact in shared spaces, led by Michaella Benvenisti, Leadership Development and Life Coach based in Berlin.

event_desc_eng:
Join the HeartSpace tribe and kick-off the day with a breathwork session. In this 30 minute session, you will discover the connection between the breath and creativity. With Corinna as your guide, you will practice ancient techniques of Pranayama followed by a short meditation to re-calibrating your nervous system and set an intention for your day.
No mat or equipment needed. Meeting Point: 4th Floor Reception at Urbanstrasse 71

event_desc_eng:

A great opportunity to meet new people and have a few hours of fun in a relaxed setting.
Coworking game master Matthias is visiting Berlin and he is bringing some of his favorite games for larger groups.

We will play multiple games in parallel, so you are welcome to bring your own game if you like.

event_desc_eng:
Varied and exciting days await you at the Coworking Festival!

Here is our schedule:
- Daily from 05/09/22 - 09/09/22
From 16Hs: Presentation and tour of Land.Gut Berlinchen.
From 17:30Hs to 18:30Hs: Diverse activities such as walks around the lake, Horseback riding or bicycle tours to the lake via the Berlinchen airfield.
- On 06.09:
From 18:30Hs: Barbecue and music. Happy hour for drinks.
- On 08.09:
From 18:30Hs: Campfire and music. Happy hour for drinks.

Become part of our Coworking Festival from 05.09.2022 - 09.09.2022 with great advantages on our Land.Gut.
- Free day pass for our Co.Working area.
- 20% discount when booking overnight stays.
- Free transport from Wittstock (on call).

We look forward to welcoming you!
Land.Gut Berlinchen Team.

event_title_eng: Product networking - How to design great products
event_desc_eng:
Design veteran Rob Hamblen joins us to talk about all things product design, how to conduct world class Sprints and build products using intelligent design.

Join us for some beers and networking with other product people!
Drinks and refreshments will be provided. If you want help support this or any of our events you can buy us a coffee or support us on Patreon.

event_desc_eng: If you are planning to come and spend some time in our coworking space, we're super excited to have you around and would like to invite you for a tour of MotionLab.Berlin. Let's take a time to relax with some beers after work and walk around the lab. We will show you our community, our Workshop areas, machines and get an exclusive look into various products that were developed at MotionLab.Berlin. you've probably seen some in the streets of Berlin! Our tour & beer is happening daily at 5pm. Just check out the link and book a slot for you. In case you're wondering what's special about us, it's EVERYTHING! Check out our pictures, book a tour and find out:)

Wir zeigen euch unsere Community, unsere Workshops, Maschinen und geben euch einen exklusiven Einblick in verschiedene Produkte, die im MotionLab.Berlin entwickelt wurden. Einige davon habt ihr bestimmt schon auf den StraÃŸen Berlins gesehen! Unsere Tour & Bier findet tÃ¤glich um 17 Uhr statt. Schau dir einfach den Link an und buche einen Platz fÃ¼r dich. Trust us, we got you covered. We not only have the perfect hardware space and program for you, but also the perfect opportunity to find your future startup soulmate.

on Monday, 05.09 we will have our regular community breakfast here at MotionLab.Berlin. At 10:30 AM we want to start into this fabulous Co-working Festival week and we would like you to join as well.

Let's have some good coffee & delicious croissants.

What is in it for you besides drinks & food? You can get to know our hardware community and some of the MotionLab staff members as well have a look around. If you want you can take the whole day and experience our co-working area for yourself or you just book one of the daily tours to get an in-depth experience (with beer).

We are looking forward to see you at MotionLab.Berlin

Please RSVP, so we have a better overview on how much food is needed for the breakfast :)

event_title_eng: Workshop - Introduction to Laser Cutting and Engraving
event_desc_eng: In this three-hour workshop you will learn how to use a laser cutter. This technology allows you to prototype with different types of materials by cutting and engraving. By the end of the session, you will have gone through the whole production process of a laser cut piece: from preparing your data, to cutting and engraving an object, and you will be able to work independently with the laser cutters.
event_title_de: Workshop - Introduction to Laser Cutting and Engraving
event_desc_de: In diesem dreistÃ¼ndigen Workshop lernen Sie, wie man einen Laserschneider benutzt. Mit dieser Technologie kÃ¶nnen Sie durch Schneiden und Gravieren verschiedene Arten von Materialien zu Prototypen verarbeiten. Am Ende des Kurses werden Sie den gesamten Produktionsprozess eines lasergeschnittenen WerkstÃ¼cks durchlaufen haben: von der Vorbereitung Ihrer Daten bis zum Schneiden und Gravieren eines Objekts, und Sie werden in der Lage sein, selbststÃ¤ndig mit dem Laserschneider zu arbeiten.

event_title_eng: Coworking Best Practices in Tech and User Experience
event_desc_eng:
How can coworking operations improve using technology, and how can coworking operators benefit from it?

To answer this, weâ€™ve brought together a specialist panel who will share four different perspectives on best practices in technology and user experiences in coworking, at our interactive event held during Berlin Coworking Festival 2022 at Spaceshack Coworking on Tuesday 6th September, 2-5pm CEST.

The speakers joining us, and their topics of expertise brought to this event, includes:

Ben Lorenz, Space Shack: Troubleshooting coworking and facility tools - From payment and meeting room systems to home automation and access control, which tech problems do most coworking spaces need to solve?

Christian Schmitz, SALTO Systems: Innovation in access control - How does technology improve customer experience across the entire ecosystem?

Kristina Schneider Cobot: How can a coworking space management software help operators run, grow and automate their spaces, whilst creatively hacking and building upon existing systems?

Matthias Zeitler, Coworking Bansko: How powerful no-code tools automate your processes in coworking spaces, and which case studies exemplify the use of different technology integration solutions.

After briefly introducing these topics, our speakers will participate in a group discussion where youâ€™ll have the opportunity to ask questions and share your thoughts interactively on the use of technology in coworking spaces.
This free event is open to all.

Register your attendance here: https://lets-meet.org/reg/d7712fedf180e85874
event_title_de: Coworking Best Practices fÃ¼r Technologie und User Experience
event_desc_de:
Wie kÃ¶nnen Coworking-Betriebe durch den Einsatz von Technologie verbessert werden und wie kÃ¶nnen Coworking-Betreiber davon profitieren?

Um dies zu beantworten, haben wir auf unserer interaktiven Veranstaltung wÃ¤hrend des Berlin Coworking Festivals 2022 im Spaceshack Coworking am Dienstag, den 6. September, 14-17 Uhr, ein Expertengremium zusammengestellt, das vier verschiedene Perspektiven zu Best Practices in der Technologie und Benutzererfahrungen im Coworking teilt MESZ.

Zu den Rednern, die zu uns kommen, und ihren Fachthemen, die zu dieser Veranstaltung gebracht werden, gehÃ¶ren:

Ben Lorenz, Space Shack: Fehlerbehebung bei Coworking- und Facility-Tools - Von Zahlungs- und Besprechungsraumsystemen bis hin zu Heimautomatisierung und Zugangskontrolle, welche technischen Probleme mÃ¼ssen die meisten Coworking Spaces lÃ¶sen?

Christian Schmitz, SALTO Systems: Innovation in der Zutrittskontrolle â€“ Wie verbessert Technologie das Kundenerlebnis im gesamten Ã–kosystem?

Kristina Schneider Cobot: Wie kann eine Coworking-Space-Management-Software Betreibern helfen, ihre Spaces zu betreiben, zu erweitern und zu automatisieren, wÃ¤hrend sie gleichzeitig bestehende Systeme kreativ hacken und darauf aufbauen?

Matthias Zeitler, Coworking Bansko: Wie leistungsstarke No-Code-Tools Ihre Prozesse in Coworking Spaces automatisieren und welche Fallstudien den Einsatz verschiedener Technologie-IntegrationslÃ¶sungen veranschaulichen.

Nach einer kurzen EinfÃ¼hrung in diese Themen werden unsere Referenten an einer Gruppendiskussion teilnehmen, in der Sie die MÃ¶glichkeit haben, Fragen zu stellen und Ihre Gedanken interaktiv zum Einsatz von Technologie in Coworking Spaces auszutauschen.
Diese kostenlose Veranstaltung steht allen offen.
Registrieren Sie Ihre Teilnahme hier: https://lets-meet.org/reg/d7712fedf180e85874

event_desc_eng:
"You have the idea and we have the technology"
Every Wednesday, the COLab (Creative Open Lab) opens its doors to anyone who is interested in trying out the high-tech machines in the makerspace of Startblock B2 for free. Among other things, laser cutters, 3D printers, sewing machines and the COLab experts will be at your disposal. No matter if you do have a concrete idea or just want to sneak in and get inspired by the start-up community around you, everyone is welcome to try out the machines starting 10am till 6pm.
event_desc_de:
"Ihr habt die Idee und wir haben die Technik"
Jeden Mittwoch Ã¶ffnet das COLab ( Cretaive Open Lab) seine TÃ¼ren fÃ¼r alle, die Lust haben sich an den HighTech Maschinen des Mitmachbereichs im Startblock B2 auszuprobieren. Zur VerfÃ¼gung stehen euch unter anderem 3D-Drucker, Lasercutter, NÃ¤hmaschinenâ€¯undâ€¯die dazugehÃ¶rigen Expert:innen; und das alles for free! Ganz egal ob mit konkreter Idee oder ohne, von 10-16 Uhr ist jede/r willkommen, sich auszuprobieren oder von der (Start-up) Community  inspirieren zu lassen.

event_desc_eng:
Between Balconies live at tuesday coworking, Bundesallee

BETWEEN BALCONIES' Instagram describes them as "Four friends performing on the streets of Berlin". Well, Winter's coming, so it's time to move indoors!
Join us at tuesday coworking in Wilmersdorf on Wednesday, 7 September at 7:30pm and enjoy the first of four free evenings of music as part of our Chandelier Sessions, happening between now and November.

ABOUT BETWEEN BALCONIES

"Between Balconies create a soundscape of blues/folk, jazz and rap. With harmonizing vocals, beatbox and a dozen instruments, they can be heard between balconies and on the streets of Berlin.

The quartet of childhood friends comes from Berlin-Reinickendorf and a small town in Hesse, where they performed together on school stages and youth cafÃ©s. They found themselves between lockdowns in a living room in Wilmersdorf and began to fulfil a lifelong dream."

BETWEEN BALCONIES are:

- Anita Rind - Vocals, Percussion
- Julius Florstedt - Bass
- Justus Verdenhalven - Vocals, Gitarre, Banjo, Ukulele, Piano
- Timo EnÃŸlin - Vocals, Beatbox, Gitarre, Klarinette, Keys, Percussion

Since space is limited, weâ€˜re restricting attendance to 50. You must have a ticket to guarantee entry. Get your free ticket on eventbrite.com. And please only reserve your ticket if you're sure you're going to come. Thanks!

Donation-based drinks will be available at the space on the evening.

The Chandelier Sessions series of concerts is sponsored by the Charlottenburg-Wilmersdorf Cultural Advisory Board.

Tickets (free): https://www.eventbrite.com/e/chandelier-sessions-no-14-between-balconies-tickets-410375864257
event_desc_de:
Auf Instagram beschreiben sich "Between Balconies" als "Vier Freunde, die auf den StraÃŸen von Berlin auftreten". Nun, der Winter kommt, also ist es an der Zeit, nach drinnen zu gehen!Â 

Komm am Mittwoch, den 7. September um 19:30 Uhr ins tuesday coworking in Wilmersdorf und genieÃŸe den ersten von vier kostenlosen Abenden mit Musik im Rahmen unserer Sundown Sessions, die bis November stattfinden.

BETWEEN BALCONIES
kreiert eine Soundwelt aus Blues/Folk, Jazz und Rap. Mit mehrstimmigem Gesang, Beatbox und einem Dutzend Instrumenten sind sie zwischen Balkonen und auf den StraÃŸen Berlins zu hÃ¶ren.

Das Quartett aus Jugendfreunden kommt aus Berlin-Reinickendorf und einer hessischen Kleinstadt, wo gemeinsam auf SchulbÃ¼hnen und im JugendcafÃ© performt wurde. Man fand sich zwischen Lockdowns in einem Wilmersdorfer Wohnzimmer wieder und begann, sich einen alten Traum zu erfÃ¼llen. Between Balconies - das ist handgemachte Musik mit einem Augenzwinkern hier und da.

BETWEEN BALCONIES sind
Anita Rind - Vocals, Percussion
Julius Florstedt - Bass
Justus Verdenhalven - Vocals, Gitarre, Banjo, Ukulele, Piano
Timo EnÃŸlin - Vocals, Beatbox, Gitarre, Klarinette, Keys, Percussion

IG @between.balconies
YT - Between Balconies

Da der Platz begrenzt ist, ist die Teilnehmerzahl auf 50 Personen beschrÃ¤nkt. Du benÃ¶tigst ein Ticket, um den Eintritt zu garantieren. Hol dir dein kostenloses Ticket auf eventbrite.com. Und bitte reserviere ein Ticket nur, wenn du sicher bist, dass du kommen kannst. Vielen Dank!

Am Abend werden GetrÃ¤nke auf Spendenbasis vor Ort erhÃ¤ltlich sein.

Die Konzertreihe â€Sundown Sessionsâ€œ ist gefÃ¶rdert vom Kulturbeirat Charlottenburg-Wilmersdorf.


Karten (kostenlos): https://www.eventbrite.com/e/chandelier-sessions-no-14-between-balconies-tickets-410375864257

event_desc_eng:
Join us for the 2nd edition of the International Potluck Dinner on Thursday (8 September)!

As part of the 2022 Berlin-Brandenburg Coworking Festival Week, we'll be trying dishes from different countries made by our members. Not only that, we openly welcome non-members to come and bring their dishes too! Donâ€™t worry if you think you canâ€™t cook â€“ it doesnâ€™t have to be complicated or fully made from scratch. You can even buy the dish from a local restaurant â€“ as long as it represents your country and you are willing to share it with everyone else!

Please reach out to Valerie at info@tuesdaycoworking.com if you want to participate!
Come and experience new things with us!
event_desc_de:
Am Donnerstag (8. September) findet die 2. Ausgabe des International Potluck Dinner statt!

Im Rahmen der 2022 Berlin-Brandenburg Coworking Festival Week werden wir Gerichte aus verschiedenen LÃ¤ndern probieren, die von unseren Mitgliedern zubereitet wurden. Aber nicht nur das, auch Nicht-Mitglieder sind herzlich eingeladen, ihre Gerichte mitzubringen!
